com.joliciel.talismane.corpus

Class CorpusRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.corpus.CorpusRule

  • public class CorpusRule
extends java.lang.Object
    A single rule used to transform the elements on a corpus line.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CorpusRule(Config config)
      Reads "criteria" and "actions" from a configuration.
      "criteria" is a map of CorpusLine.CorpusElement to regex, which need to match the full value of the element.
      "actions" is a map of CorpusLine.CorpusElement to values, which will be updated when the rule is matched.
      CorpusRule(java.util.Map<CorpusLine.CorpusElement,java.util.regex.Pattern> criteria, java.util.Map<CorpusLine.CorpusElement,java.lang.String> actions) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(CorpusLine corpusLine, java.util.Map<CorpusLine.CorpusElement,java.lang.String> values)
      Apply the rule to a corpus line, and add the values that need to be updated to the values map, as long as no value yet exists for the element being updated.
      java.util.Map<CorpusLine.CorpusElement,java.lang.String> getActions()
      The actions to be applied if the criteria are met.
      java.util.Map<CorpusLine.CorpusElement,java.util.regex.Pattern> getCriteria()
      The criteria to be met - ALL criteria must match.
      java.lang.String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CorpusRule

        public CorpusRule(java.util.Map<CorpusLine.CorpusElement,java.util.regex.Pattern> criteria,
                  java.util.Map<CorpusLine.CorpusElement,java.lang.String> actions)

      • CorpusRule

        public CorpusRule(Config config)
        Reads "criteria" and "actions" from a configuration.
        "criteria" is a map of CorpusLine.CorpusElement to regex, which need to match the full value of the element.
        "actions" is a map of CorpusLine.CorpusElement to values, which will be updated when the rule is matched.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public void apply(CorpusLine corpusLine,
                  java.util.Map<CorpusLine.CorpusElement,java.lang.String> values)
        Apply the rule to a corpus line, and add the values that need to be updated to the values map, as long as no value yet exists for the element being updated. Thus, the first rule to match that updates a given element will win, for each element.

      • getCriteria

        public java.util.Map<CorpusLine.CorpusElement,java.util.regex.Pattern> getCriteria()
        The criteria to be met - ALL criteria must match.

      • getActions

        public java.util.Map<CorpusLine.CorpusElement,java.lang.String> getActions()
        The actions to be applied if the criteria are met.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
